long_description: These versatile Seirus All Weather gloves provide non-bulky warmth-perfect for any cold-weather sport or activity. A breathable, 4-way stretch All Weather tri-laminate is sandwiched between the outer shell and fleece lining for warmth; seams are not sealed. Outer nylon layer is tough yet flexible to allow complete dexterity; fleece inner face is soft and warm against your skin. Durable abrasion resistant palm gives you excellent grip. Knit cuffs help keep heat in and cold out.
short_description: These versatile Seirus All Weather gloves provide non-bulky warmth-perfect for any cold-weather sport or activity.
